name: Ready-Robot: Planetary Revival Project
description:
Ready-Robot: Planetary Revival Project is a 2D Unity action/adventure game currently being made for RIT's IGME 450: Casual Game Development class using C#. The only requirement for the assignment was that it be a casual game, otherwise we have been given full reign on choosing what we want to do and how.

 For this project, I have been acting as the lead programmer and scrum-master. I have programmed the enemy AI and everything in the overworld, from player movement to enemy collision.

Made by: Alessandro Fiorella, Abigail Buchman, Cori Mori, and Mike Patron
